column1: Uchi////Uchi is one of the best sushi restaurants in Houston.  It's actually fusion sushi
column2: which makes it interesting in a different way.It's in a historic building where the Felix Mexican restaurant formerly was.  It's chef is Tyson Cole
column3: James Beard award winner.  The menu is very imaginative and tasty.  The fried milk dessert was unique and tasty.  The vibe was cool
column5: and happening.  A great place for sushi!
